metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000654 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.Description: GNU Libtasn1-4.13 libtasn1-4.13 version libtasn1-4.13, libtasn1-4.12contains a DoS, specifically CPU usage will reach 100% when runningasn1Paser against the POC due to an issue in_asn1_expand_object_id(p_tree), after a long time, the program will bekilled. This attack appears to be exploitable via parsing a crafted file.

criterions.comment: libtasn1-6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
